title: ProKarma to Showcase Comprehensive DevOps Solution at DevOps Enterprise Summit
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 6:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: ProKarma 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA--(Marketwired - October 19, 2015) - ProKarma, a global IT solutions company, today announced that it will showcase its DevOps service offerings at the DevOps Enterprise Summit on Oct. 19-21 in San Francisco, California. 
ProKarma's industry experts will be on hand to discuss its DevOps capabilities that aim to help companies implement a holistic approach to software releases by promoting collaboration between all stakeholders, from IT and operations to product and software engineering teams. 
Businesses today face mounting pressure to decrease their time-to-market, creating a demand for cost-effective feedback that helps them make informed adjustments during their development cycles. With a focus on optimizing the delivery pipeline, which includes continuous integration, build/test automation, deployment automation and managed services implemented throughout the entire delivery and management stack, ProKarma's DevOps solution helps clients achieve and sustain immediate value, stability and efficiency. 
ProKarma's DevOps practice delivers a framework that allows customers to focus their efforts on business efficiency and product development rather than on keeping their systems afloat. By automating the release processes, ProKarma's DevOps framework helps operations and software developers deploy their products and enhancements more quickly and with fewer defects. By enabling the organization to continuously identify and adjust the most critical items, developers have up to 40 percent more time to write code, reducing software time-to-market by 50 percent-remarkable cost and time savings for businesses. 
"DevOps provides a framework that meets the demands of today's business climate by promoting internal and external collaboration, ensuring that our customers' business goals and technology objectives are aligned optimally," said Vijay Ijju, CTO, ProKarma. 
Feedback is also an integral component of ProKarma's DevOps practice, with real-time monitoring that reduces defects by 80 percent. Clients can access up-to-date trends, analytics and tracking, allowing them to adjust their business practices based on up-to-the-minute information. 
About ProKarma 
ProKarma delivers integrated technology and business process outsourcing solutions for over 200 global leaders in a wide range of industries and markets. ProKarma is co-headquartered in Portland, Oregon, and Omaha, Nebraska, with sales and delivery centers in the United States, India, Argentina and Peru. ProKarma was selected as a Global Services 100 Provider and ranked as the fastest-growing IT services company in America by Inc. 500. For more information, visit www.prokarma.com .
